name: Spellbook - Diamond Dust
description: Spellbook needed to learn Diamond Dust. Used by Mystic Muses

name: Spellbook - Throne of Ice
description: Spellbook needed to learn Throne of Ice. Used by Mystic Muses

name: Spellbook - Throne of Wind
description: Spellbook needed to learn Throne of Wind. Used by Storm Screamers

name: Spellbook - Divine Power
description: Spellbook needed to learn Divine Power. Used by Cardinals

name: Spellbook - Mana Gain
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mana Gain. Used by Eva's Saints and Shillien Saints

name: Amulet - Chant of Protection
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Protection spell. Used by Doomcryers

name: Amulet - Seal of Blockade
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Blockade spell. Used by Dominators

name: Spellbook - Fire Vortex Buster
description: Spellbook needed to learn Fire Vortex Buster. Used by Archmages

name: Spellbook - Ice Vortex Crusher
description: Spellbook needed to learn Ice Vortex Crusher. Used by Mystic Muses

name: Spellbook - Wind Vortex Slug
description: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Vortex Slug. Used by Storm Screamers

name: Forgotten Scroll - Meteor
description: Spellbook needed to learn Meteor. Can be used by an Arch Mage and a Soul Taker. Can be acquired at level 81

name: Forgotten Scroll - Star Fall
description: Spellbook needed to learn Star Fall. Can be used by a Mystic Muse and a Storm Screamer. Can be acquired at level 81

name: Dark Seed
description: Item needed for the Imbue Dark Seed Skill. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Special Bolt
description: Item needed for the Deadly Roulette, and Bleeding Shot skills. It cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: Sealed Dynasty Sigil Piece
description: Ingredient needed for a Dwarf to make a Dynasty Sigil. It can be sold to public stores

name: Recipe: Sealed Dynasty Sigil (60%)
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for the Sealed Dynasty Sigil. Requires Create Item Skill - Level 9. 60% success rate

name: Recipe: Sealed Dynasty Sigil (100%)
description: Exclusive to Dwarves. Recipe for making a Sealed Dynasty Sigil. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 9. The success rate is 100%

name: Chaotic Sealed Dynasty Sigil
description: A rare Sealed Dynasty Sigil that requries a thorough varnishing. It can be varnished by the Blacksmith of Mammon

name: Chaotic Dynasty Sigil
description: A rare Sealed Dynasty Sigil that requires a thorough varnishing. It can be varnished by the Blacksmith of Mammon

name: Dynasty Sigil
description: Increases M. Def. and Resistance to Dark

name: Sealed Dynasty Sigil
description: Sealed Masterwork Item. Seal can be removed by the Blacksmith of Mammon or Maestro Ishuma. \0

name: Sealed Arcana Sigil
description: Sealed Masterwork Item. The seal can be broken with the help of the Blacksmith of Mammon. \0

name: Red Crescent Earring
description: Cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted

name: Necklace of Devotion
description: Cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted

name: Ring of Devotion
description: Cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized, or enchanted

name: Shadow Item - War Axe
description: A Shadow Item with the power of a War Axe. It cannot be traded, dropped, crystallized, or given other functions

name: Dynasty Leather Armor
description: Can only be worn by Duelists and Grand Khavataris

name: Dynasty Leather Armor
description: Can only be worn by Dreadnoughts, Titans, Fortune Seekers, Maestros, Doombringers and Soul Hounds

name: Scroll of Escape: Fortress
description: A magical scroll that transports you to your Fortress. If you don't have a Fortress, it will relocate you to the nearest village

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Fortress
description: A magical scroll that transports you to your Fortress quickly

name: Transformation Scroll: Onyx Beast
description: A Scroll that transforms you into an Onyx Beast for 30 minutes

name: Transformation Scroll: Death Blader
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Death Blader for 30 minutes

name: Transformation Scroll: Grail Apostle
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Grail Apostle for 30 minutes

name: Transformation Scroll: Unicorn
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Unicorn for 30 minutes

name: Transformation Scroll: Lilim Knight
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Lilim Knight for 30 minutes

name: Transformation Scroll: Golem Guardian
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Golem Guardian for 30 minutes

name: Transformation Scroll: Inferno Drake
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Inferno Drake for 30 minutes

name: Transformation Scroll: Dragon Bomber
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Dragon Bomber for 30 minutes

name: Agathion Bracelet
description: A bracelet that summons a cute Rainbow Clan Hall Agathion. Shadow Item that cannot be exchanged or dropped. It lasts for 700 minutes

name: Blessed Ring of Escape
description: Makes Blessed Scroll of Escape available for up to 250 minutes, with a 60-second recharge for Escape. Only one effect is applied, even if you wear 2 identical rings

name: Grey Talisman - Yeti Transform
description: Can be transformed into a Yeti for a certain amount of time. Transformation is cancelled if unequipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped

name: Grey Talisman - Buffalo Transform
description: Can be transformed into a Buffalo for a certain amount of time. Transformation is cancelled if unequipped. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped

name: Battleground Spell - Shield Master
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Shield Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Bless Shield Lv 6, and Haste Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Battleground Spell - Wizard
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Shield Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Acumen Lv 1, and Empower Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Battleground Spell - Healer
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Shield Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Acumen Lv 1, and Heal Empower Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Battleground Spell - Dagger Master
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Might Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Focus Lv 1, and Haste Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Battleground Spell - Bow Master
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Might Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Guidance Lv 1, and Haste Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Battleground Spell - Berserker
description: Effects of Berserker Spirit Lv 2 and Clarity Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Battleground Blessed Scroll of Escape
description: Relocates you to the nearest village. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Battleground Blessed Scroll of Resurrection
description: Resurrects a dead character and restores his or her Exp. completely. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Battleground Transform Spell
description: When used, it transforms you into a pixy for a certain amount of time. It can only be used on the battleground during a siege battle or a fortress battle. It will have no effect if used while in a transformed state

name: Battle Health Recovery Potion
description: Recovers HP when in use. Characters below Level 52 are not affected. Usable only during a Siege or Fortress war

name: Battle Mana Recovery Potion
description: Recovers MP when in use. Characters below Level 52 are not affected. Usable only during a Siege or Fortress war

name: Battle CP Recovery Potion
description: Recovers CP when in use. Characters below Level 52 are not affected. Usable only during a Siege or Fortress war

name: Mental Strengthening Potion
description: Increases Resistance to Hold and Sleep for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Medusa's Potion
description: Becomes invincible temporarily. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Instant Haste Potion
description: Increases Speed instantly. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Grey Talisman of Upper Grade Fishing
description: Obtains Upper-Grade Fishing Mastery Level (Lv 24). Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped

name: Capture Rope
description: Disturbs movement of targets. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war

name: Cursed Red Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: A red crystal that is cursed by the darkness, stage 14. Take this to Legendary Blacksmith Shadai in Hellbound to process

name: Cursed Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: A blue crystal that is cursed by the darkness, stage 14. Take this to Legendary Blacksmith Shadai in Hellbound to process

name: Cursed Green Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: A green crystal that is cursed by the darkness, stage 14. Take this to Legendary Blacksmith Shadai in Hellbound to process

name: Wolf Collar
description: Necklace used to summon wolves. It takes away some experience points the Pet Master earns. \0

name: Animal Slayer's List
description: Destroys the animal slayers of the Mimir Forest, the Crimson Spiders

name: Bloody Red Claw
description: A claw dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin

name: Hot Springs CP Potion
description: Instantly recovers 1000 CP when used

name: Pig Lollipop
description: Magic lollipop with a cute piggy drawing on it. Upon a strike, it makes a piggy noise.  One can be transformed into a cute piggy for a certain amount of time. Exchange and drop are not available for this item which can be stored in a personal warehouse

name: Dynasty Leather Armor
description: Can only be worn by Hierophants, Dominators, Doom Cryers and Judicators

name: Enchanter Circlet (Kamael only)
description: A circlet that can be worn by the Kamael Race only, exclusively for the Enchanter class after completion of 2nd or 3rd class transfer. Cannot be worn in a sub job condition. Uses 2 hair accessory slots

name: Baylor's Earring
description: Dark Resistance +30, MP +31

name: Seed: Dark Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Dark Coda. For best results, a level 5-15 character must plant it on a level 5-15 monster

name: Seed: Red Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Red Coda. For best results, a level 8-18 character must plant it on a level 8-18 monster

name: Seed: Chilly Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Chilly Coda. For best results, a level 11-21 character must plant it on a level 11-21 monster

name: Seed: Blue Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Blue Coda. For best results, a level 14-24 character must plant it on a level 14-24 monster

name: Goblin Circlet (Event)
description: Gold colored, Goblin shaped hair accessory. This item is designed for use in events only and cannot be exchanged or dropped

name: White Half Mask
description: A mysterious costume accessory that covers half of the wearer’s face. This item cannot be traded or dropped

name: Black Half Mask
description: A mysterious black mask. Don’t you wish you knew where you could find the other half? This item cannot be traded or dropped. 4th Anniversary commemorative item

name: Sweet Fruit Cocktail
description: A Cocktail made of various rare fruits. When consumed, it bestows temporary effects of Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Bless Shield, Bless Body, Haste, and Vampiric Rage for a certain amount of time

name: Fresh Fruit Cocktail
description: A Cocktail made of various rare fruits. When consumed,  it bestows temporary effects of Berserker Spirit, Blessed Body, Magic Barrier, Shield, Wind Walk, Blessed Soul, Empower, Acumen, and Clarity effects for a certain amount of time

name: Battle Manual - Penetrate Shot
description: A Battle Manual needed to learn Penetrate Shot. Used by Warders.\\nRequired level: 20\0

name: Battle Manual - Erase Mark
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Erase Mark. Used by Troopers and Warders.\\nRequired level: 24\0

name: Battle Manual - Ultimate Escape
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Ultimate Escape. Used by Arbalesters.\\nRequired level: 43\0

name: Battle Manual - Create Special Bolt
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Create Special Bolt. Used by Arbalesters.\\nRequired level: 43\0

name: Battle Manual - Restoration Impact
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Restoration Impact. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 49\0

name: Battle Manual - Destroy Instinct
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Destroy Instinct. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 40\0

name: Battle Manual - Restoration
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Restoration. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 40\0

name: Battle Manual - Oblivion
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Oblivion. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 43\0

name: Battle Manual - Thin Skin
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Thin Skin. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 46\0

name: Battle Manual - Protection Instinct
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Protection Instinct. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 46\0

name: Battle Manual - Vampiric Impulse
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Vampiric Impulse. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 52\0

name: Battle Manual - Magic Impulse
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Magic Impulse. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 55\0

name: Battle Manual - Enervation
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Enervation. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 60\0

name: Battle Manual - Weak Constitution
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Weak Constitution. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 62\0

name: Battle Manual - Spite
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Spite. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 66\0

name: Battle Manual - Mental Impoverish
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Mental Impoverish. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 68\0

name: Battle Manual - Soul Harmony
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Soul Harmony. Used by Inspectors.\\nRequired level: 70\0

name: Seed: Alternative Dark Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Dark Coda. For best results, a level 5-15 character must plant it on a level 5-15 monster

name: Seed: Alternative Red Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Red Coda. For best results, a level 8-18 character must plant it on a level 8-18 monster

name: Seed: Alternative Chilly Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Chilly Coda. For best results, a level 11-21 character must plant it on a level 11-21 monster
